Package javax.microedition.rms

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ExtendedRecordListener
    The ExtendedRecordListener interface extends the RecordListener interface to provide additional event handling capabilities for record store operations.
    RecordComparator
    The RecordComparator interface defines a method for comparing two records.
    RecordFilter
    The RecordFilter interface defines a method for determining whether a record matches a particular criteria.
    RecordListener
    The RecordListener interface provides methods to listen for changes in a RecordStore.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    The App class extends the Application class and serves as the entry point for the application.
    RecordEnumeration
    The RecordEnumeration class provides methods to manage and iterate over records.
    RecordStore
    The RecordStore class provides a mechanism for managing a collection of records.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidRecordIDException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when an invalid record ID is encountered in a record store operation.
    RecordStoreException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when an operation on a record store fails.
    RecordStoreFullException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when a record store is full.
    RecordStoreNotFoundException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when a record store cannot be found.
    RecordStoreNotOpenException
    This class represents an exception that is thrown when an operation is attempted on a record store that is not open.
